instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions.
2. FONTS: Import 'Fraunces', 'Public Sans', 'Caveat', 'Homemade Apple', and 'Reenie Beanie' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. LAYOUT: Implement a 'DashboardLayout' component with a fixed sidebar and scrollable main content area. Use the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard home.
4. AI GENERATION UI: Create a split-view interface. Left side: Document Viewer (mock with an iframe or placeholder). Right side: Question Generator form.
5. HANDWRITING: For the export preview, create a container with a paper texture background (use CSS pattern) and apply the selected handwriting font and ink color.
6. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components but override the default radius to '0.75rem' and use the 'Fraunces' font for all Card titles and Dialog titles.
7. LANDING PAGE: Use the 'landing_hero' image with a heavy overlay (bg-slate-900/80) to make white text pop. Use 'Fraunces' for the main headline: 'Turn Textbooks into Tests in Seconds'.
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button, input, and card has a unique 'data-testid' attribute (e.g., 'upload-btn', 'generate-questions-btn').
9. THEME: Default to LIGHT mode. The 'Dark' mode should be a deep 'Navy/Slate' theme, not pitch black.
10. FILE UPLOAD: Use a drag-and-drop zone with a dashed border (border-dashed) and a subtle blue background (bg-indigo-50) on hover.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No default centered layouts without purpose.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. 'p-8' is the new 'p-4'.
Never use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Fraunces'.
Respect the 'Deep Ink' primary color strategy.
